description:

This episode I complete my new set of modular cave tiles. I cover the process of painting, special wash, clear coating, and discuss a few options to consider for your set.

How to make a basic black wash video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I5U7UFFuX-Q&t=160s

How to drybrush video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=62U-9D3RpJg&t=2s
















Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: New Cave Tiles For D&D Tutorial Part 3 (Black Magic Craft Episode 044)
